===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|广|發|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=house}}.

During the {{w|Zhou Dynasty|Zhou}}–{{w|Qin Dynasty|Qin}} period, {{och-l|灋}} and {{och-l|法}} were used to represent {{lang|zh|廢}}.

===Etymology===
Related to {{och-l|乏|to lack; to neglect}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|འབབ||to go down; to move downward; to descend; calamity}}, {{m|bo|འབེབས||to cause to fall; to bring down}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Also compare {{cog|th|บอบ||weak, worn out, run down}} ([[ibid.]]).
